meanings.sent1: The scarabaeuses crawled slowly across the ground.
meanings.sent2: I found a jar full of scarabaeuses in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The scarabaeuses had a race to see who could reach the flower first.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of scarabaeuses shimmered like precious gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the scarabaeuses, their shiny shells reflecting the light.

meanings.sent1: She collected scarabaeuses from all around the world.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a variety of scarabaeuses in its exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The scarabaeuses in the jar seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The scarabaeuses on the necklace symbolized good luck and protection.
meanings.sent5: The scarabaeuses chirped softly in their terrarium, creating a soothing sound.
